name: Rhyperior
author: Nakaoka
flavor_text: It puts rocks in holes in its palms and uses its muscles to shoot them. Geodude are shot at rare times.

poke_power.name: Earth Fissure
poke_power.effect: Once during your turn, when you play Rhyperior from your hand to evolve 1 of your Pokémon, you may discard the top 3 cards from your opponent’s deck.

attacks.name: Rock Wrecker
attacks.effect: This attack’s damage isn’t affected by Weakness or Resistance. Rhyperior can’t attack during your next turn.
